alert.note: Alert for South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 2:13PM PST until January 21 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches, with higher elevations seeing up to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Elevations above 5500 feet around Crater Lake. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Potential for 1 inch per hour snowfall rates in the afternoon and through the evening. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.
